summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3843 for the improvement of alley in Block 31, Pontius' 2nd Addition, Supplemental, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, from East Mercer Street to Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47165, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
